Trinity/Nightlight:

"YOu will be ok, Aertaur" said Trinity worried while she hugged 
Aerotaur "You NEVER will leave us"

"I'll be ok, Trinity" said Nightlight "No bad will happen... "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     His shaking gets a little worse and he reverts to his centaur 
mode.  "I'm 
> Aerotaur.  I hear you are looking to join us."  He stopped talking 
and 
> realized that he had stopped shaking.  "Hmm.  Must only affect my 
robot mode."
